attributes.action: Prevent international migrants from claiming benefits
attributes.additional_details:
In recent years, the number of Polish immigrants has increased significantly. On January 1st 2014, the restrictions on the number of Romanian and Bulgarian workers will be increased which will result in increased migration to the United Kingdom, which will strain schools, hospitals and public services. Benefits are being abused and resulting in increased issues on the economy.

This government will need to stop access to any benefit possible and deny access for 24 months to the UK if caught begging or using criminal activity.
